full_sentence: A friend of the socialist is not and never will be a friend of mine.
I don't agree with scapegoating but you have to be honest and open; most hermies deserve it
I get that you are stupid but this level is of stupidity is too much.
I wouldn't eat food that has been touched by a dyke

anti-black crimes matter...... ---Guys let me tell ya... I'm forsaking America or The United States for now at least... Let it plunge and it's already $27 trillion in debt anyways...Anyone that comes after me as Aquarius (Plus Flame as well). The Heavens for that matter as well (spiritually bound)... I'm too tired of this hell after 20 or so years to even care anymore...I do not work with anyone for now at least and never really did other than God if not Jesus Christ for the most part I've always kind of been a solo type myself alone... too tired to care anymore... I forsake The United States  due to all it's racism, corruption, tyranny etc alone (plus devil alien grey technology that must go or project blue / black beam alone... It's forsaken here on all of this alone for now at least as well to...) and I'm letting The United States if not the west blow out completely at that point alone (let the world spin for a while at that point or this one...)... $27 trillion in debt anyways... Wasn't really going to matter anyways... I gave up 10-15 years ago alone anyways... like usual I was never here to save you or all of this alone... It's just a giant mess in the end... I figured 10-15 years (age 15 or 16 or so at least... Around age 20 I was completely done though...) to just give up and never care again at that point... Let America or The United States die at that point...
